description: This table contains a list of breakpoints from the current release.

fields.name: Sample_name
fields.description: A sample is an instance of a portion of a tumour being examined for mutations. The sample name can be derived from a number of sources. In many cases it originates from the cell line name. Other sources include names assigned by the annotators, or an incremented number assigned during an anonymisation process. A number of samples can be taken from a single tumour and a number of tumours can be obtained from one individual.

fields.name: ID_SAMPLE
fields.description: COSMIC sample identifier

fields.name: ID_TUMOUR
fields.description: COSMIC tumour identifier

fields.name: Primary_site
fields.description: The primary tissue/cancer from which the sample originated. More details on the tissue classification are available from http://cancer.sanger.ac.uk/cosmic/classification. In COSMIC we have standard classification system for tissue types and sub types because they vary a lot between different papers.

fields.name: Site_subtype_1
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 1) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: Site_subtype_2
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 2) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: Site_subtype_3
fields.description: Further sub classification (level 3) of the samples tissue of origin.

fields.name: Primary_histology
fields.description: The histological classification of the sample.

fields.name: Histology_subtype_1
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 1) of the sample.

fields.name: Histology_subtype_2
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 2) of the sample.

fields.name: Histology_subtype_3
fields.description: Further histological classification (level 3) of the sample.

fields.name: Mutation_Type
fields.description: Type of mutation: Intra/Inter (chromosomal), tandem duplication, deletion, inversion, complex substitutions, complex amplicons.

fields.name: Mutation_ID
fields.description: unique mutation identifier

fields.name: Breakpoint_Order
fields.description: For variants involving multiple breakpoints, the predicted order along chromosome(s), otherwise '0'.

fields.name: GRCh
fields.description: Coordinate system used

fields.name: Chrom_From
fields.description: The chromosome where the first variant/breakpoint occurs.

fields.name: Location_From_min
fields.description: The first position in breakpoint range.

fields.name: Location_From_max
fields.description: The last position in breakpoint range.

fields.name: Strand_From
fields.description: Positive or negative.

fields.name: Chrom_To
fields.description: The chromosome where the last variant/breakpoint occurs.

fields.name: Location_To_min
fields.description: The first position in breakpoint range.

fields.name: Location_To_max
fields.description: The last position in breakpoint range.

fields.name: Strand_To
fields.description: Positive or negative.

fields.name: Non_templated_ins_seq
fields.description: Non Templated Sequence (if any) which is inserted at the breakpoint. The sequence is not encoded.

fields.name: Pubmed_PMID
fields.description: The PUBMED ID for the paper that the sample was noted in.

fields.name: Id_Study
fields.description: Lists the unique Ids of studies that have involved this structural mutation.
